title: 1950?s book ID
content:
I'm looking for a book I borrowed from my last workplace a while back. I'm not really looking for the book, only a reference in the book (the author makes references to a US stencil company or similar) which I'd really like to research for my next project. I think the book was dated around 1950, and was aimed for students on typography.

I've searched amazon and archive.org for the book, but I can't seem to find exactly what I'm looking for.

I have two pictures from two different pages in the book, and I'd love if someone could ID the book or give me some info on the reference I'm after.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105064146im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0223__6106.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105064146im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0229__5467.jpg)

Christian
